<Text: Caistor:  As its name implies, it was originally a Roman castrum or fortress.>

Text: Caistor:  It lies at the north-west edge of the Lincolnshire Wolds, on the Viking Way, and just off the A46 between Lincoln and Grimsby, at the A46, A1084, A1173 and B1225 junction.
